TopicTitle: The option to add flags to anywhere on your ship

Articles.Content:
I Think it'd be cool to add like i guess decals anywhere on your ship and it shows your flag because

there aren't too many parts that show your flag, Thoughts?
This would probably be better as a mod IMO but I could probably be convinced otherwise in the name of  aesthetics.

There used to be a fantastic mod that took the mission flag you were using, and presented to with a bunch of flags to place as parts on your ship.  I really liked using it.  They came in flat, curved, all kinds.

I would love some way similar to pretty-up our vessels prior to launch.   Lots of irl ships seem to have logos on their fairings, which would probably be overly complicated.
I think this would be a good idea to have free placement of the flag on your ships. While not a major gameplay changing feature, it should help add a touch of flair to any ship.
Decals would be pretty awesome to have. I would especially like to have all sorts of stripes and other shapes to simply place them on the vessel.
I like this idea.  Also if a text box could be used as a decal/flag then we could have our vessels' names showing too.

5 hours ago, pandaman said:

I like this idea.  Also if a text box could be used as a decal/flag then we could have our vessels' names showing too.

Great idea

I approve.

I myself have thinking as such for a long while.

I would love to put large orange NUMBERS on probes.
